message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more upfront since the value decreases for me over time.
I'll take a bit more since the value doesn't decrease for me
Bob, my friend, let's be reasonable. This offer is better for you than the last one, and time is ticking away - for both of us.
I'm willing to take a bit more, since the value is decreasing for you and time is on my side
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  We're both losing out because of your stubbornness. Let's just split it evenly and call it a day!
I'm not backing down. You're the one who's losing value over time, not me. This is my best offer yet
